article: italy 's fiat is the new owner of the bulk of chrysler 's assets , closing a deal wednesday that saves the troubled u.s. automaker from liquidation and places a new company in the hands of fiat 's chief executive officer .
abstract: fiat closes deal to take chrysler s good assets
